mapper.select: SELECT sr.id, sr.registration_id, sr.activity_id, a.title as activity_title, sr.user_id, sr.service_date, sr.start_time, sr.end_time, sr.duration, sr.certificate_no, sr.certificate_url, sr.generate_time, sr.create_time FROM service_record sr LEFT JOIN activity a ON sr.activity_id = a.id WHERE sr.id = #{id} AND sr.is_deleted = 0

SELECT sr.id, sr.registration_id, sr.activity_id, a.title as activity_title, sr.user_id, sr.service_date, sr.start_time, sr.end_time, sr.duration, sr.certificate_no, sr.certificate_url, sr.generate_time, sr.create_time FROM service_record sr LEFT JOIN activity a ON sr.activity_id = a.id WHERE sr.user_id = #{userId} AND sr.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY sr.service_date DESC
SELECT * FROM service_record WHERE registration_id = #{registrationId} AND is_deleted = 0
